settings.footer_content_left:
Under the Sale and Supply of Alcohol Act 2012 it is an offence:

to supply alcohol to a person under the age of 18 years (max penalty $2,000).

for a person under the age of 18 years to purchase or receive liquor (max penalty $2,000).

Liquor Licence No. 60/OFF/13/2017

settings.title: Step One
settings.text:
You choose ze package
4 bottles to start, or dive headlong into a half-dozen?
You choose!

settings.title: Step two
settings.text:
We choose ze wines
After selflessly tasting so many, our wine guru
chooses the best to send you each month

settings.title: step three
settings.text:
You love ze wines
We carefully ship you your vino. It's that easy.
Cheers!

settings.title: So... how do I get started?
settings.content:
Each month, we choose a few wonderful, worldly wines for you to enjoy.

No lock-in contracts, no fuss.

Just choose a package:

settings.title: Want to know more about wine?
settings.content: Bottle Service takes the guesswork out of choosing a great drop, with bottles delivered to your door each month. Easy!

settings.image_blog_subtitle: This is a subheading for your blog page
